info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 06 at 1:23PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Caldwell and northeast Burke Counties through 200 PM EDT... At 123 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong storms north and west of Lenoir, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Lenoir, Sawmills, Granite Falls, Valdese, Gamewell, Hudson, Icard, Cajah`s Mountain, Drexel and Hildebran. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
